name: vertex.
description:
Ludum Dare Entry Page

This is a small game I made for Ludum Dare 35.

Instructions: Your goal is to resolve all line intersections. You achieve this by moving around points ("vertices"). Select a node with your cursor using WASD, and move the vertex with Shift + WASD.

Every move you make subtracts 1 from your bonus time, which gets added to your total time when you solve a puzzle.
